Question & Options:
In the movie 'Race 3' (2018), which of the following statements are true regarding the character portrayed by Anil Kapoor?
Options:
A. Anil Kapoor plays the role of Shamsher Singh.
B. Shamsher Singh is a villain in the movie.
C. Anil Kapoor's character is related to the protagonist.
D. Shamsher Singh is a family member of the main characters.
Correct Answer: Anil Kapoor plays the role of Shamsher Singh., Shamsher Singh is a villain in the movie., Shamsher Singh is a family member of the main characters.
